title: Remove the stupid remake option.
body:
Please get rid of remake. I know majority of people will say that remake is great since no one wants to sit through a 5v4 and I'll probably get a lot of downvotes for this but get rid of the stupid fucking remake option. I just started up a ranked game, got into loading screen and out of nowhere, power outage. The game was remade and I lost LP for something COMPLETELY out of my control. Before anyone says, fix your issues before you play, there's no way I could've known that my power could've cut out, plus most dc's at the beginning of the game aren't because of internet issues, but rather random bugsplats that once again are out of control. 

So please, either get rid of remake, or remove the punishments for being a "leaver"

replies.body: Nah, power outages occur rather less than people being disconnected by the Riot client itself after a front page update. The remake option is good, you just got unlucky man.

Understand that in ranked, you're hardly going to accept any disadvantage you can avoid, and the early game is often very important, and even being gone as long as 5 minutes can have a significant impact on a game. Even if you do return, you have still put your team at a disadvantage they do not deserve. 

Sure it sucks losing LP for something out of your control, but you know what sucks more? Losing LP for something out of your control AND having to sit through an entire game to get there. 

If you only have the occasional snag then the remake system isn't going to make any negative difference to you in the long run, it's a single lost game of LP maybe one or twice a season. That's nothing. On the flipside, it's going to protect you from the "my internet died" and the "I got called away" and the "I didn't dedicate 5 minutes to this game nevermind an hour" and all those other games ruined by an early AFK, which MORE than makes up for one or two games lost LP to a remake.
So the 9 other people in the game have to sit through a 5v4 because your power went out? No thanks

> [{quoted}](name=fattyhotdogs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=Npgprnar,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-10-25T02:02:17.238+0000)
>
> So the 9 other people in the game have to sit through a 5v4 because your power went out? No thanks

You don't have to sit through a 5v4 for the whole game, I was going to return to the game. Everyone who brings up this point always disregards the fact that the disconnected player will normally return. Everyone just assumes they stay afk the whole game, which is not the case..
The match is ruined by the time you get back. It's an automatically lost lane

There's nothing wrong with the remake feature or leaver punishments. The remake penalty is suitable considering you're effectively ruining the match for up to 9 other players, regardless of whether it is within your control or not, and when it comes to things like blackouts, they occur so infrequently/inconsistently that they should never even impact the leaver punishments a person receives in the first place (or the overall rank/MMR of any given player)

Just take the hit and work back the lost LP. There's no reason to change a perfectly good feature (or, rather, 2 perfectly good features) just because *you* got unlucky *once*.

The match is ruined if you assume the disconnected never returns, but 9 times out of 10, they'll be back, just not within the stupid 3 minute time frame..

For a lot of people, even 2-3 minutes might be enough for it to ruin the match. It only takes a minute for an even match to go completely sideways. In situations like that, it doesn't matter if the person returns, the match has already been ruined.

The chances of you getting a power cut is very unlikely. I've tried many times where I get a low prior queue for something that I did not do but it is what it is right. Remake actually helps the game become more fair as 4 v 5 is more unlikely to happen.
Good idea, i always remake when my tf see a yasuo. then i close the game, wait 3 minute, new game!, yay!

Dude, I know what you mean, ive seen a 5 stack abuse it after we got first blood on them(even tho they had no afk) but the idea of it is really good, most players in low teir will be like "give me mid or i afk" or some players just never join, although most of the time it is riots fault with bugs on their end, it has good intentions which is what we need to make this game less toxic, just wish it wasnt buggy :s
